alert.note: Alert for Bell; Falls; Limestone; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 11:20AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McLennan, Bell, northwestern Limestone and central Falls Counties through NOON CST... At 1119 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Waco to near Morgan`s Point Resort to 6 miles northeast of Briggs. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Killeen, Waco, Temple, Harker Heights, Belton, Woodway, McGregor, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, and Moody around 1125 AM CST. Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Lacy-Lakeview, Salado, Beverly Hills, Lorena, Troy, and Bruceville-Eddy around 1130 AM CST. Northcrest around 1135 AM CST. Golinda, Hallsburg, and Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir around 1145 AM CST. Riesel and Lake Creek Lake around 1150 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Cedar Valley, Watt, Moffat, Willow Grove, Mooreville, Owl Creek, Prairie Dell, Asa, Prairie Hill, and Meadow Grove. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 278 and 344. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
